  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3321</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Students with Special Needs-Helping Them & Ourselves</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer mit speziellem, ihnen u. selbst 
Benötigen-Helfend</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Étudiants avec spécial Avoir besoin-Aidant elles
et nous-mêmes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estudantes com especial Necessit-Ajudando a lhe & 
a ourselves</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Allievi con speciale bisogno-Aiutando loro & noi 
stessi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σπουδαστές με ειδικό ανάγκη-βοηθώντας τους & τους 
ίδιους</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estudiantes con especial Necesitar-Ayudando le y 
ourselves</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this issue of the ETNI magazine RAG, the writer presents a common-sense approach of accommodating students with special needs</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">special needs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">accommodations.</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Ausgabe des ETNI Zeitschrift LAPPENS, 
stellt der Verfasser geläufig-erfassen Annäherung der zuvorkommenden
Kursteilnehmer mit speziellen Notwendigkeiten dar</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette issue du CHIFFON de magazine d'ETNI, 
l'auteur présente commun-sentent l'approche des étudiants serviables
avec les besoins spéciaux</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta introdução do PANO do compartimento de 
ETNI, o escritor apresenta comum-deteta a aproximação de estudantes 
obsequiosos com necessidades especiais</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa emissione del PANNO dello scomparto di 
ETNI, il produttore presenta comune-percepisce il metodo degli allievi
servizievoli con i bisogni speciali</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το ζήτημα του ΚΟΥΡΕΛΙΟΎ περιοδικών ETNI, ο 
συγγραφέας παρουσιάζει μια προσέγγιση κοινής λογικής της παροχής
φιλοξενίας των σπουδαστών με ειδικές ανάγκες</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta aplicación el TRAPO del compartimiento de
ETNI, el programa de escritura presenta comu'n-detecta el acercamiento
de estudiantes serviciales con necesidades especiales</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">spezielle Notwendigkeiten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anpassungen.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les besoins spéciaux</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">logement.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">necessidades especiais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">acomodações.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">bisogni speciali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sistemazioni.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ειδικές ανάγκες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">στεγάσεις.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Inglés</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">necesidades especiales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">comodidades.</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
